CustomField.description: Add the value(s) that complete the condition you want to evaluate. If you have chosen "in" as your condition, make sure items of the list are separated by a comma. For boolean values, use 'true' or 'false'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Add the value(s) that complete the condition you want to evaluate. If you have chosen "in" as your condition, make sure items of the list are separated by a comma. For boolean values, use 'true' or 'false'.
CustomField.label: Value(s)
